question: 歳
userAnswer:
<tag><read>さい</read>:suff:</tag> years-old
<tag><read>とし</read>:suff:</tag> year | age/years | past-one's-prime/old-age
activeAnswer:
<tag><read>さい</read>:suff:</tag> years-old
<tag><read>とし</read>:suff:</tag> year | age/years | past-one's-prime/old-age
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well. This is put on the end of numbers to show how old someone is.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji.
